name: "Debt Collector" Tank Top (t-shirt style, not wife beater)
description:
The "Debt Collector" Limited Edition Tank Top.

With this pre sale you will get 1 color front & 1 color back print in gray ink on a black tank top in any size you want!!!!

We "may" have a handful of random sizes for sale at the release show but this is the only way to for sure get one.

We will ship these worldwide for only $5.00 or you can pick it up in person at the vinyl release show on Saturday April 6th @ McGuffy's House Of Rock.....

By the way, the release show is FREE!!!!!!!!

*** PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR SIZE WITH YOUR PAYMENT!!!!!!

name: "Somewhere Beneath The Sunshine" Limited Edition T Shirt
description:
The "Somewhere Beneath The Sunshine" Limited Edition T Shirt is being printed to coincide with our 12" inch split w/ Close The Hatch coming out Saturday April 6th 2013 on Red Moth Records.

With this pre sale you will get 2 color front print only on a black T in any size you want!!!!

We "may" have a handful of random sizes for sale at the release show but this is the only way to for sure get one.

We will ship these worldwide for only $5.00 or you can pick it up in person at the vinyl release show on Saturday April 6th @ McGuffy's House Of Rock.....

By the way, the release show is FREE!!!!!!!!

*** PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR SIZE WITH YOUR PAYMENT!!!!!!

name: "The Mission Statement. The Vehicle. The Escape." CD (2006)
description:
"The Mission Statement. The Vehicle. The Escape." CD (2006)

Tracks:
1. First Blood (*featuring hidden track)
2. With An Upraised Knife (*featuring hidden track)
3. Swallowing Swords (*featuring extended outro)

Running time 61:07

Designed by Tony Goff & released independently by idiedtrying. ©idiedtrying. All Rights Reserved. 

Reviews:
"Superbly stalker-like elements of psychosis & neuroticism have bloody footprints leading back to headfuckers like Today Is The Day & late-90s Neurosis." -Metal Maniacs 

"Picture Mastodon, Ocean Chief, Yob, Dystopia & Bongzilla.... multiply that by 10 & you have I DIED TRYING." -Michael from S.O.I. Records/EMB 

"Their dedication to their art pays off. This is definitely not 3:05 candy-coated pop here. These guys believe what they preach." -Musician Critician

"Above everything - very innovative and strange." -Metal Revolution
